name: Word Puzzle - Crosswords
description:
Do you enjoy word games? Are you a puzzle game master?

Word Addict is the ultimate combination of challenging, yet relaxing word puzzle game!
Gameplay is designed to be a calming and fun experience.
How to play it? Simply click on letters, swap them and find hidden words.

Interesting? It should be. It’s a tremendous brain training challenge!
While solving puzzles you’ll progress through the game and unlock more wondrous landscapes. Take each level at your own pace with unlimited tries.
You’ll immerse yourself in the beautiful backgrounds & soothing sound, relax and ease your mind.

SOLVING OUR PUZZLES:
TEACHES MAPPING OUT NEXT STEPS
Learning how to solve the Word puzzles means planning and remembering few initial moves. It’ll help your mind to memorize and map out steps in to solve problems.

IMPROVES YOUR PATIENCE
When you decide to play this puzzle game it will definitely test your perseverance. But those who are persistent and patient will be able to solve it quickly.

IMPROVES YOUR PROBLEM-SOLVING SKILLS
It will help you become more creative with the way you decide to handle day to day tasks.

IMPROVES YOUR MEMORY
You will be playing a lot, which in-turn will help you improve your memory!

KEEPS YOUR BRAIN ACTIVE
It'll keep the cognitive functions of your mind in shape!

Our modern take on word puzzles game will sharpen your brain and help you unwind.
You’ll never experience a dull moment after you try our game! Play it once and just you won’t be able to put it down. It is great for all ages!
